messages.subject: Submission Reminder
messages.msgSnippet: Just a reminder to anyone who was wanting to send in a blog (or any other type of writing) submission to Unschooling Voices. I ve gotten so many great ones
messages.messageBody:
Just a reminder to anyone who was wanting to send in a blog (or any
other type of writing) submission to Unschooling Voices. I've gotten so
many great ones already and I can't wait to post it up so all of you can
read it!! Remember, it's open to ALL unschoolers, new and veterans
alike. You can use the "question of the month" as a submission if you
want to. It's up to you. Here's the link for more information. You can
also read last months submissions from that link.
http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html
<http://www.foreverparents.com/UnschoolingVoices.html>

Thanks!!

Joanne
Mom to Cimion (13), Shawna (11) & Jacqueline (7)



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
